textAfterTable: Gloves SIZE X-Small Small Medium Large X-Large Hand Size 6 - 6 1/2" 7 - 7 1/2" 8 - 8 1/2" 9 - 9 1/2" 10 - 10 1/2" How to Measure Hands • To get the most accurate measurement, use a flexible measuring tape and measure around a flat hand at the knuckles; do not include your thumb. Also measure your hand length from the base of your palm to the end of your middle finger. Use the larger of the two measurements to select your glove size. Hats SIZE Adult One Size Fits Most Head Circumference 21 1/2 - 23 1/2" Arm Warmers SIZE Small / Medium Large / X-Large Length 16 - 18" 18 - 20" Wrist 6 - 6 1/2" 7 - 7 1/2" Upper Arm 11 - 12" 12 1/2 - 13 1/2" How to Measure for Arm Warmers • Length - measure from your wrist to the top of the bicep • Wrist - measure your full wrist circumference • Upper Arm -
